settings.text-secondary: Not for Sale to Minors  California Proposition 65 Warning: This product contains chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm.

settings.text:
If youre looking to give up smoking cigarettes, and are interested in vaping, White Horse Vapor is here to facilitate that transition with luxury vape products like disposable e-cigs and premium e-liquids. We also carry vape hardware products like mesh coils, tanks, and battery replacements if you have a vape device already.

Our White Horse Vapor line of luxury vape pens and disposables are expertly filled by us right here in the USA! Our premium silver disposables are offered in six different flavors ranging from tried-and-true classics like tobacco to unique fan-favorites like Fireball. Our disposables carry 3.5mL of premium e-liquid and have a puff count of over 800. We also carry luxury vape pens and disposable e cigs from renowned brands like Fume, Hyde, Esco Bars, Elf Bar, and more.

Our premium e-liquids are hand-crafted in our headquarters of Rhode Island and are made using cold-pressed organic fruits with little to no added ingredients. We have a wide selection of flavored liquids, as well as unflavored liquids that allow you to curate your own custom flavor experience with add-on extracts.

Our online store boasts an impressive catalog of sub ohm and nicotine salt e-liquids. Our sub ohm liquids are ideal for vape mods and devices and deliver voluminous clouds and intense flavor. Our nicotine salt luxury vape liquids provide a higher-nicotine alternative to sub ohm liquids, perfect for those weening themselves off cigarettes or simply looking for denser nicotine levels. In addition to nicotine-based luxury vape products, we also cater to THC and CBD lovers with edible gummies, cookies, and topical balms. Ditch cigarettes with the help of our luxury vape products and premium
e-liquids today! You can view our latest arrivals online, or if youre in the North Providence area, be sure to stop by our storefront to chat with one of our experienced sales representatives!

settings.text: Shop the latest disposable vape arrivals at White Horse Vapor from top-selling brands like Geek Bar, RAZ, iJoy, Lost Mary, Hidden Hills, and many more! We offer a wide range of disposable vapes, hardware, and e-liquids from top manufacturers. All our vapes feature mouth-watering flavors that are sure to satisfy even the most seasoned vapers.
settings.text-read-more: Whether you're seeking bold, rich flavors or something lighter and refreshing, our selection has something for every palate. Shop the newest vapes and indulge in a truly satisfying vaping experience.

settings.title:
THE WHITE HORSE
VAPOR DIFFERENCE
settings.text:
Health and wellness might not be the first thing you think of when you picture vape shops, but we envision a better world where people can enjoy a satisfying nicotine kick without endangering their health. According to the CDC, Cigarette smoking causes more than 480,000 deaths each year in the United States. This is nearly one in five deaths.

Unfortunately, for smokers trying to quit, the outlook is grim, with only 3% - 5% of people actually able to kick the habit. At White Horse Vapor, we identified challenges to be solved where other people saw only problems. The real issue with nicotine patches, gum, lozenges and all those other products is that they dont work to address and solve the real problem.

Heres the thing, habits have psychological and physical components. Our vapes offer that same experience of smoking and getting the nicotine, but without the toxic cloud of smoke. Tobacco cigarettes release over 7,000 toxic chemicals, many of which cause cancer. Our commitment to quality and your health means we deliver an outstanding product that can help you switch out your smoking habit for a more effective, less harmful vaping experience.


At White Horse Vapor, we know youre looking for the highest quality products that work well and taste great - because thats what we want too. If you're new to vaping, disposable vapes are convenient, rechargeable vaping devices that fit in your pocket and let you puff anywhere you want, on the go. We offer the full product lines from: Elf Bar, RAZ, Geek Bar Pulse, and more.
